com.sitewhere.spi.scheduling

Interface IScheduleManagement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILifecycleComponent, ITenantLifecycleComponent

    public interface IScheduleManagement
extends ITenantLifecycleComponent
    Management interface for persistent scheduling implementations.
